org.qcri.rheem.core.plan.rheemplan

Class InputSlot<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qcri.rheem.core.plan.rheemplan.Slot<T>
      • org.qcri.rheem.core.plan.rheemplan.InputSlot<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - see Slot

    public class InputSlot<T>
extends Slot<T>
    An input slot declares an input of an Operator.
